heading: HB08213
0: AN ACT TO PROMULGATE A CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY STANDARD FOR EACH DURABLE INFANT OR TODDLER PRODUCT
status: Pending with the Committee on WELFARE OF CHILDREN since 2018-09-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08213
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PROMULGATE A CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY STANDARD FOR EACH DURABLE INFANT OR TODDLER PRODUCT
ABSTRACT : Proposes to prevent unsafe nursery/children’s products from getting to the market by requiring independent testing of all durable infant and toddler products by the Department of Trade. Enumerates these products intended for use, or that may be reasonably expected to be used, by children under the age of five years, which includes among others: cribs, toddlers beds/chairs, walkers, carriers strollers, and swings.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN ON 2018-09-18
